metadata.title: Documentation
metadata.description: View a list of step-by-step tutorials for learning to deploy with Waypoint.

layout.name: docs-root-landing
layout.subtitle: View a list of step-by-step tutorials for learning to deploy with Waypoint.

metadata.title: Waypoint by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Waypoint provides a modern workflow for build, deploy, and release across platforms.

integrationsConfig.description: A curated collection of official, partner, and community Waypoint Integrations.

pageContent.pageSubtitle: Learn and develop your knowledge of Waypoint with these tutorials and code resources.

cards.title: What is HCP Waypoint?
cards.description: HCP Waypoint lets platform teams define patterns to let developers deploy application infrastructure.

cards.title: Templates
cards.description: Templates define the infrastructure and configurations that developers need to create new projects.

cards.title: Add-ons
cards.description: Add-ons define infrastructure that developers can add to existing projects.

cards.title: Managing templates
cards.description: Templates consist of a published no-code module in HCP Terraform and a template definition in HCP Waypoint.

cards.title: Using templates
cards.description: Developers create HCP Waypoint projects from templates and get pre-configured infrastructure for their applications.

cards.title: Managing add-ons
cards.description: Add-ons consist of a published no-code module in HCP Terraform and an add-on definition in HCP Waypoint.

cards.title: Using add-ons
cards.description: Developers can install add-ons to their HCP Waypoint projects to gain additional application functionality by way of pre-configured infrastructure.

cards.title: Role-based access control
cards.description: Role-based access control lets you restrict access to specific HCP Waypoint functionality based on user roles.

cards.title: HCP Terraform integration
cards.description: HCP Waypoint templates and add-on definitions leverage HCP Terraform no-code modules to deploy their underlying infrastructure.
